mylib package¶

Submodules¶

mylib.eda module¶

mylib.eda.corr_analysis(dataframe)¶

Selects the most important features from the point of view of correlation.

Parameters

dataframe – source dataframe

Returns

a list of most valuable string features

mylib.eda.data_cleansing(dataframe)¶

Delete features with high percent of nan values. Also fill nan values with appropriate values.

Parameters

dataframe – source dataframe

Returns

a dataframe with less number of columns and filled nan values

mylib.eda.encode_features(dataframe, num_feats, cat_feats)¶

Provide dummy encoding of categorical features

Parameters

  • dataframe – source dataframe

  • num_feats – a list of string numerical features

  • cat_feats – a list of string categorical features

Returns

a dataframe contains both of each types features

mylib.eda.filter_cat_features(dataframe)¶

Filter categorical features based on EDA.

Parameters

dataframe – source dataframe

Returns

a dataframe with less number of columns and encoded into ranks features

mylib.eda.filter_num_features(dataframe)¶

Filter numerical features based on exploratory data analysis.

Parameters

dataframe – source dataframe

Returns

a dataframe with less number of columns and filtered values

mylib.eda.get_nan_features(dataframe)¶

Get features in dataset which contain nan values.

Parameters

dataframe – source dataframe

Returns

a list of strings features

mylib.eda.main(data_path)¶
mylib.eda.plot_cat_features_countplots(dataframe)¶
builds histograms of the distribution of the number of

elements in each category of each categorical feature.

Parameters

dataframe – source dataframe

Returns

mylib.eda.plot_corr(dataframe, features, threshold=0.3)¶

Plot the correlation matrix of each pair of numerical features.

Parameters

  • dataframe – source dataframe

  • features – a list of string features

  • threshold – threshold for displaying the correlation value in the matrix

Returns

mylib.eda.plot_num_features_pairplots(dataframe)¶

Plot the joint distributions of each pair of numerical features.

Parameters

dataframe – source dataframe

Returns

mylib.eda.split_features(dataframe)¶

Split features into three groups selecting by data type: object, int or float.

Parameters

dataframe – source dataframe

Returns

three lists of features grouping by their data types

mylib.model module¶

mylib.model.data_preprocessing(data_path)¶

Provide data preprocessing contains split into train/test, usage of normalization and a target’s box-cox transformation.

Parameters

data_path – a path to data

Returns

train/test splitted dataframes and optimal lambda param for box-cox transformation

mylib.model.test(model, data_path)¶

Provide test of trained model

Parameters

  • model – a trained model

  • data_path – a path to data

Returns

list of predicted prices

mylib.model.train(data_path)¶

Train Ridge regression model.

Parameters

data_path – a path to data

Returns

a trained model

mylib.utils module¶

mylib.utils.read_data(file_path)¶

Read data from .csv file

Parameters

file_path – a path to data

Returns

pandas-like dataframe contains data
